name: WinNeutron 95
description:
At the end of 1999, a virus named "Mother" threatens to destroy the central servers of the Internet and thus tip the world into total darkness and chaos.

As the ultimate antivirus, your mission is to find Mother's henchmen, destroy them and reboot the servers to save humanity from extinction.

Controls : 

  • UP : move forward
  • DOWN : backward
  • LEFT & RIGHT : Turn
  • X & C : Strafe
  • D : Shoot
  • F : Open & Use

Robine "Madame Biscuit" Kosinski : Game Design, Level Design, Game art

Romain "Ipnoze60" Jeanneau : Game design, Level Design

Antoine "T I X" Illiano : Sound Design

The musics and some sprite use in that game are the property of Microsoft Inc. All right reserved.
